and it's a high performance or high performance computing environment and Amazon was an immediate fit for it so we
took this thing we were running internally we move that entire workload and a amazon and lo and behold it cut
the cost by about sixty percent for that one system it ran about twenty percent faster and that was a big win so once we
saw that we thought well if we can be that effective there can we be more effective in other areas and we started

regulators with our auditing departments with all the other people who are going to have very strong opinions about using

and secure and over the course of about twenty three months we managed to not
only get everyone's buy-in but as of april of this year our entire
infrastructure was moved into amazon com or AWS so now as we're talking with the
